import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" function Recipes() { const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState(); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); let auth = localStorage.getItem("user"); let user = JSON.parse(auth); const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; useEffect(() => { getRecipes(); }, []); const getRecipes = async () => { let response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/recipe/getAllRecipes'); setRecipes(response.data); }; const handleClick = ()=>{ if(user.premium){ alert("hi") } else{ openModal(); } } return (

Latest Recipes

{recipes?.map((recipe, index) => (

{recipe.recipe_title}

{recipe.prep_time}

))}
{isModalOpen && (

Subscription Plans

Choose a plan that fits your needs:

Weekly

  • 10 GB Space
  • 3 Domain Names
  • 20 Email Address
  • Live Support

  • 5 Domain Names
  • Unlimited Email Address
  • Live Support
Order Now

  • Unlimited GB Space
  • 30 Domain Names
  • Unlimited Email Address
  • Live Support
Order Now
)}
); } export default Recipes;
